replies.msg: 咁只係因為佢冇沙拿既射術啫

在掙紮了半個多賽季之後，恩沙基的AC米蘭生涯看起來真的要告一段落了。貝盧斯科尼在賽季中幾場令人抓狂的失利之後都選擇了息事寧人，而上週末輸給薩斯索羅則徹頭徹尾讓貝盧斯科尼心灰意冷。這麼長時間以來，貝盧斯科尼第一次在公開表示AC米蘭下季將迎來一名新主帥。

　　面對薩斯索羅的失利成為了貝盧斯科尼公開發飆的導火索。《晚郵報》表示，儘管有球證執法的因素，但球隊在球場上毫無心氣的表現令貝盧斯科尼抓狂。不管場上的局面是如何，球員給人的感覺都是絲毫沒有贏波的意願，而球會主席將這一切歸罪於教練的帶隊不力。

　　昨天，《拖連奴體育報》打出醒目的標題稱「貝盧斯科尼：再見，恩沙基！」報導中表示，在對陣薩斯索羅的失利經過了2天的發酵之後，貝盧斯科尼終於面對記者吐露了真實想法：「我們之間有些想法差別很大，我們的年輕天才得不到機會。」

　　《晚郵報》也在頭版表示「貝盧斯科尼趕走恩沙基」。賽季第一次，貝盧斯科尼公開批評了恩沙基的一些做法。球隊成績差當然是重要的原因，但在用人思想上的不統一也是恩沙基最終黯然下課的關鍵因素。在貝盧斯科尼看來，AC米蘭隊中並不缺少天才球員，尤其是年輕的天才球員，但恩沙基並沒有給他們足夠的表現機會。比如預備隊中的卡拿布里亞，在AC米蘭的邊衛人荒階段，也沒能得到恩沙基的信任。

　　事實上，恩沙基的球隊在今年也創造了AC米蘭多項歷史最差。自從意甲擴軍至20支球隊以來，今年的場均得分(1.27分)是最低的，入球(50個)是最少的，失球(49個)是最多的。儘管聯賽還有兩輪，但球隊已經創造了最多負場(12場)和最多和波(13場)。與此同時，一支意甲球隊通常需要40個左右的積分才能確保護級，而AC米蘭現在的積分是──46分

replies.msg:
According to PianetaMilan, the Rossoneri are working on a ‘surprise’ reinforcement for the attacking department, a versatile player able to play on both flanks and as an attacking midfielder.


He would arrive from a huge European club, a guarantee of quality, the report adds. Lucas Paquetà is on the way out and he has so far been the deputy to Hakan Calhanoglu (or often third choice when Bonaventura was fit), but Milan hope to sell the Brazilian for at least €22.5m.

The arrival of this ‘Mr. X’ would in fact complete the group in terms of players who can be deployed behind Zlatan Ibrahimovic, with at least two players in each position.

Samu Castillejo and Alexis Saelemaekers on the right, Rafael Leao and Ante Rebic on the left, Calhanoglu and the new player in the centre.

PianetaMilan add that in the next few hours, following further checks on the real feasibility of the negotiation, further details will emerge including a name.

啲報紙佬

quote.msg:

The arrival of this ‘Mr. X’ would in fact complete the group in terms of players who can be deployed behind Zlatan Ibrahimovic, with at least two players in each position.

Samu Castillejo and Alexis Saelemaekers on the right, Rafael Leao and Ante Rebic on the left, Calhanoglu and the new player in the centre.

PianetaMilan add that in the next few hours, following further checks on the real feasibility of the negotiation, further details will emerge including a name.

The arrival of this ‘Mr. X’ would in fact complete the group in terms of players who can be deployed behind Zlatan Ibrahimovic, with at least two players in each position.

Samu Castillejo and Alexis Saelemaekers on the right, Rafael Leao and Ante Rebic on the left, Calhanoglu and the new player in the centre.

眾所周知，由前巴塞隆拿主帥哥迪奧拿執教嘅曼城，無論實力、財政同人脈，都係最適合美斯嘅球隊，博彩公司《Betfair》最新賠率顯示，曼城係美斯下一間球會頂頭大熱，只有2.5倍(見表)，國際米蘭同巴黎聖日耳門就以4倍並列次熱門。

First was Ismaël Bennacer of AC Milan who’s stats were all above the average of the group with 5.1 interceptions per 90, 8.2 defensive duels per 90 and 6. 9 PAdj interceptions. Leiva’s defensive statistics are remarkable with 2.9 aerial duels per 90 (2nd), 6.1 interceptions per 90 (2nd), 10.1 defensive duels per 90 (1st) and 7.3 PAdj interceptions (2nd). As a result, Leiva is at the top of the group defensively with Bennacer and Brozovic both closely behind him.
